statements: SELECT * FROM influencer_recommendations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencer_recommendations WHERE engagement_rate > 5.0;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_date FROM influencer_recommendations WHERE followers_count >= 10000;
SELECT * FROM influencer_recommendations WHERE followers_count < 5000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT id, influencer_name, campaign_name, engagement_rate FROM influencer_recommendations WHERE campaign_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencer_recommendations WHERE engagement_rate > 5.0 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, campaign_name, engagement_rate FROM influencer_recommendations WHERE followers_count > 10000 AND engagement_rate BETWEEN 3.0 AND 6.0 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_date FROM influencer_recommendations WHERE followers_count < 5000 AND engagement_rate < 2.0 ORDER BY campaign_date ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate, followers_count FROM influencer_recommendations WHERE campaign_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY followers_count DESC, engagement_rate ASC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_recommendations WHERE followers_count > 20000 OR (engagement_rate < 4.0 AND campaign_date > '2022-03-01') ORDER BY campaign_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, followers FROM influencers WHERE followers > 10000;
SELECT id, name, followers, engagement_rate FROM influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 5.0;
SELECT * FROM campaign_data ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, influencer_id, campaign_name FROM campaign_data WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers > 10000 ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT id, name, followers, engagement_rate FROM influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT influencers.name, campaign_data.campaign_name FROM influencers INNER JOIN campaign_data ON influencers.id = campaign_data.influencer_id;
SELECT influencers.name, SUM(campaign_data.followers) AS total_followers FROM influencers INNER JOIN campaign_data ON influencers.id = campaign_data.influencer_id GROUP BY influencers.name;

SELECT influencers.name, AVG(influencers.engagement_rate) AS avg_engagement_rate FROM influencers INNER JOIN campaign_data ON influencers.id = campaign_data.influencer_id GROUP BY influencers.name HAVING avg_engagement_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY avg_engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers
SELECT * FROM Campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000
SELECT performance_id, clicks, revenue FROM CampaignPerformance WHERE revenue < 1000
SELECT * FROM CampaignPerformance
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 500;
SELECT * FROM CampaignPerformance ORDER BY clicks DESC;

SELECT influencer_name, category, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM Influencers JOIN Campaigns ON Influencers.influencer_id = Campaigns.influencer_id JOIN CampaignPerformance ON Campaigns.campaign_id = CampaignPerformance.campaign_id GROUP BY influencer_name, category;

SELECT influencer_name, start_date, end_date, revenue FROM Influencers JOIN Campaigns ON Influencers.influencer_id = Campaigns.influencer_id JOIN CampaignPerformance ON Campaigns.campaign_id = CampaignPerformance.campaign_id WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, category FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT campaign_id, influencer_id, engagement_rate, conversion_rate FROM campaign_performance ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, score FROM recommended_influencers WHERE score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_id, influencer_id, engagement_rate FROM campaign_performance WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;

SELECT influencers.influencer_name, campaigns.campaign_name, campaign_performance.engagement_rate FROM influencers JOIN campaign_performance ON influencers.influencer_id = campaign_performance.influencer_id JOIN campaigns ON campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_performance.campaign_id;

SELECT influencers.influencer_name, influencers.category, recommended_influencers.score FROM influencers JOIN recommended_influencers ON influencers.influencer_id = recommended_influencers.influencer_id WHERE influencers.followers_count > 100000;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT name, followers FROM influencers WHERE followers > 10000;
SELECT genre FROM influencers WHERE genre = 'Fashion';
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers > 1000;
SELECT name, genre FROM influencers WHERE genre = 'Fashion';
SELECT influencer_id, AVG(engagement_rate) AS avg_engagement FROM campaign_influencers GROUP BY influencer_id;
SELECT i.name, ir.rating, ir.rating_date FROM influencers i INNER JOIN influencer_ratings ir ON i.id = ir.influencer_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
